title: OnOptions
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: The K-shaped economy means inflation hurts at the bottom and swells the assets at the top
items.description: “We had that kind of two-year period where the bottom was catching up and that talk of the K-shape went away,” said TSLombard economist Dario Perkins.

items.title: IBM exec asks job candidates whether they think we are in an AI bubble as a make-or-break interview test
